text: @NYGovCuomo That’s actually an insane statement. What science and medicine defeated H1N1? SARS? MERS? Ebola? Hong Kong flu (which killed an estimated 1 million)? A few mitigation actions can help, a few insane policies like yours can multiply the death tolls https://t.co/YINrhwEvVn.
